title: stoner99 author page
content:
Hi! Welcome to my author page. Below is an automatically updating, comprehensive list of everything I've written for the wiki, arranged in ascending order of rating: 

[[module ListPages created_by="stoner99" order="rating" separate="no" tags="-author" perPage="250" prependLine="||~ SCP ||~ Rating ||~ Comments ||~ Created ||"]]
|| %%title_linked%% || %%rating%% || %%comments%% || %%created_at%% ||
[[/module]]

**Note:** In the unlikely event the wiki's current licensing policy changes, or I mistakenly use an image which is not compliment with the wiki's license and this is only noticed after I have ceased activity, I preemptively deny permission for image replacements on my articles.

[[module ListPages tag="8000, -hub" separate="no" perPage="200" rating=">-20" order="rating" prependLine="||~ Title||~ Comments ||~ Author ||~ Rating||" categories="*"]]
|| %%title_linked%% || %%comments%% || %%created_by%% || %%rating%% ||
[[/module]]
author: stoner99
